title:
On the functional graph of $f(X)=X(X^{q-1}-c)^{q+1},$ over quadratic
  extensions of finite fields
authors: Josimar J.R. Aguirre, Ab\'ilio Lemos and Victor G.L. Neumann
abstract:
Let $\mathbb{F}_{q}$ be the finite field with $q$ elements. In this paper we
will describe the dynamics of the map $f(X)=X(X^{q-1}-c)^{q+1},$ with
$c\in\mathbb{F}_{q}^{\ast},$ over the finite field $\mathbb{F}_{q^2}$.
